EmailTemplate.name: SW RCA Availability 2014
EmailTemplate.subject: NCS The Challenge - Real Challenge Action dates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi all,
I hope that you have had a great summer with NCS The Challenge.
We are now fast approaching the Real Challenge Action taking place over the September weekends.
If you have already had an email with your assigned Real Challenge Action dates, please respond to this by noon on Friday 15th August at the very latest.
If you are still yet to receive this email, please respond as soon as you receive it.
Furthermore, if you are available to work additional dates, please let us know if you would like to be considered for cover.
Thank you for your hard work which has helped to make the programmes such a success.
Kind Regards,
Alice McFarlane Staffing Associate - Support Workers
